extension.name: System - Akeeba Subscriptions Expiration Notification
extension.author: Nicholas K. Dionysopoulos
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 3, or later
extension.description: Emails the users before their subscription expires, based on the preferences set in each subscription level (default: 30 and 15 days before the subscription expiration). It tries to trigger itself around midnight (server time) if there's adequate traffic, otherwise as soon as there is traffic anytime after midnight.
